Package com.challenge.pom

Class ContactPage

java.lang.Object
com.challenge.pom.Base
com.challenge.pom.ContactPage
public class ContactPage extends Base
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action. Also, this class main purpose is to wrap all possible actions that can be performed in the contact page
Author:
Jorge Canario

  • Constructor Details

    • ContactPage

      public ContactPage​(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Constructor class to instantiate.
      Parameters:
      driver - refers to the driver that will be performing actions. This class perform actions over a instance of a browser, that instance of the browser can be thought as the driver.

  • Method Details

    • getSubjectHeadingDropdownOptions

      public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getSubjectHeadingDropdownOptions()
      This method returns all the options that the "Subject Heading"'s dropdown list has
      Returns:
      a list of web elements for each of the options the dropdown list has

    • selectSubjectHeading

      public String selectSubjectHeading​(String input)
      This method selects the option, by its ordinal number of appearance, to select for "Subject Heading"
      Parameters:
      input - the ordinal number option to select
      Returns:
      a Strign with the option selected

    • selectFileForAttachmentInput

      public void selectFileForAttachmentInput​(String inputFile)
      This methods allow to upload a file into the attachment input of the contact page form
      Parameters:
      inputFile - a String specifying the absolute location of the file to be uploaded

      This method scroll to a point where the whole form is visible, allowing driver to perform action cause on it as if page loaded correctly, elements would be visible

    • isErrorOnSubmit

      public Boolean isErrorOnSubmit()
      This method confirms if the contact form generated an error after submitting the data
      Returns:
      a boolean value confirming if the contact form generate an error with the data submitted

    • isSuccessOnSubmit

      public Boolean isSuccessOnSubmit()
      This method confirms if the contact form was successfully submitted
      Returns:
      a boolean value confirming if the contact form's data was submitted successfully

    • verifyAlertBannerContent

      public Boolean verifyAlertBannerContent​(ArrayList<String> inputs)
      Verify that the content in the alert banner is the expected
      Parameters:
      inputs - is an ArrayList of the expected content of the banner where the first element in the list need to be the title of the banner
      Returns:
      A confirmation about the correct text in the banner
